src:
pero criticó sus dichos
El INADI falló a favor de Marchioli

06 Nov 2019, 05:00

El INADI falló a favor del diputado electo Alfredo Marchioli, quien había sido denunciado ante este organismo por la diputada provincial Adriana Díaz por discriminación, acusándolo de realizar una descalificación misógina.Marchioli había afirmado que Díaz buscaba polemizar en los medios con el fin "de estar en el escenario, tal cual vedette de la TV o como los personajes delirantes de Lobato o Natacha Jaitt". En su resolución, el organismo nacional consideró que "si bien los dichos del denunciado resultan poco felices", no se materializan en ellos los elementos para considerar como "discriminatoria la conducta denunciada". n
text:
but criticized his sayings
INADI ruled in favor of Marchioli

06 Nov 2019, 05:00

INADI ruled in favor of the elected deputy Alfredo Marchioli, who had been denounced before this body by the provincial deputy Adriana Díaz for discrimination, accusing him of making a misogynist disqualification. Marioli had claimed that Diaz sought to polemicize in the media in order to "be on stage, just like TV show or like the delirious characters of Lobato or Natacha Jaitt. " In its resolution, the national organism considered that "although the statements of the accused are not very happy", the elements to consider as "discriminatory the denounced conduct" do not materialize. n
